title: Q4 Marketing Campaign Review
content: Please review the attached Q4 marketing materials and provide feedback by EOD Friday. The campaign focuses on our new product launch and targets enterprise customers.

title: Team standup in 5 minutes
content: Don't forget about our daily standup in conference room B. We'll be discussing the sprint retrospective and planning for next week.

title: Client Meeting Rescheduled
content: The client meeting scheduled for tomorrow has been moved to Thursday at 2 PM. Please update your calendars accordingly and prepare the presentation materials.

title: Budget approval needed
content: The Q1 budget proposal is ready for review. Please check the shared document and approve by Wednesday so we can proceed with resource allocation.

title: Security Update Required
content: Please update your system passwords according to the new security policy. This is mandatory for all team members and must be completed by end of week.
